project1.title: Link Sharing App - A Full Stack Project
project1.description: Introducing our Link Sharing Appâ€”effortlessly share and manage links with a modern interface. Powered by ReactJS, Tailwind CSS, Vite, Appwrite, Redux Toolkit, React Router DOM, and Material UI for a seamless digital experience.

project2.title: Quiz App project
project2.description: Discover a dynamic quiz experience! Our Responsive Quiz App, built with React.js, Context API, and react-router-6, offers seamless navigation, real-time feedback, and customizable categories. Challenge yourself, track scores, and enjoy an intuitive interface. Let the quizzes begin!

project3.title: A Responsive Bill Splitter App
project3.description: Meet the Responsive Bill Splitter: a chic app blending React and Tailwind CSS for seamless bill sharing. With real-time calculations and sleek design, it's the perfect combo of style and functionality. Split bills effortlessly, anywhere, anytime.

project4.title: Add to cart
project4.description: Experience seamless online shopping with our ReactJS, Tailwind, and Firebase-powered Add to Cart app. Enjoy an intuitive interface, responsive design, and real-time updates for a secure and visually appealing shopping journey. Elevate your online retail experience today!
